name: Snap Theory
description:
Snap Theory

You are a  investigator

First person puzzle game where you snap photos of  clues for certain  theories then you upload them to the computer and name the file appropriately.

music by audionautix.com

Arrow keys/WASD - move 

Mouse - camera control

Left mouse click - Use camera

Q - lock cursor

Esc - unlock cursor

P - Pause game
